original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Removed permissions and endpoints for fine-grained PATs excluded by `excluded_actors` configuration
- Deleted "checks" permissions and related endpoints as they are excluded for fine-grained PATs
- Cleaned up data files by removing endpoints unavailable for fine-grained PATs across categories:
  - Personal access token requests
  - Personal access tokens
  - Checks API endpoints
  - Various other excluded endpoints (e.g., emojis, meta, packages)

### Title
Remove excluded endpoints for fine-grained PATs in GitHub Apps data
